Trade/Device Name(s): CareSens N Premier Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CareSens N Premier BT Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CareSens N Single Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CareSens N Premier Blood Glucose Meter
CareSens N Premier BT Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CareSens N Premier and CareSens N Premier BT blood glucose monitoring systems for self-testing using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for neonatal use or for diagnosis/screening of diabetes.
